str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To disobey, rebel, be disloyal, refuse conformity. From apeithes; to disbelieve.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pity, mercy, compassion. Of uncertain affinity; compassion.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 2nd Person Plural
str2: Your, yours. From humeis; yours, i.e. Pertaining to you.
